name: com.xebialabs.deployit.core.api.BannerService

methods.name: getBannerInfo
methods.description: Gets the banner to display

parameters.name: kind
parameters.comment: - either MAINTENANCE or INFORMATION

methods.name: updateBannerInfo
methods.description: Admin only - Set the HTML contents for either MAINTENANCE or INFORMATION banner

parameters.name: bannerInfo
parameters.comment: - a {@see com.xebialabs.deployit.core.api.dto.BannerInfo} object containing the banner kind and content

description: Retrieves and modifies the banner shown in the XL Deploy GUI

name: com.xebialabs.deployit.core.api.EnvironmentService

methods.name: getDeployedApplicationsByEnvironment
methods.description: Finds DeployedApplications on an environment. Optionally (a part of) an application name can be specified to narrow your search results, e.g. specifying deployedAppName=Depl will find XL Deploy

parameters.name: envId
parameters.comment: the environment ID to query

parameters.name: deployedAppName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of the) deployed application name to look for.

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: Which page and how many results per page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: Which ordering to use when listing results.

methods.returnDescription:
a list of {@see com.xebialabs.deployit.engine.api.dto.ConfigurationItemId} objects corresponding to deployed
 applications on the indicated environment

methods.name: getHostsByEnvironment
methods.description:
Finds Hosts that take part in the specified environment. Will return only hosts that the user has READ permission on.
 Optionally, (part of) a host name can be specified to narrow search results. A list of DeploymentInfo objects will be
 returned detailing the host ID, the host Type, and when and by whom a deployment to this host has taken place.

parameters.name: envId
parameters.comment: the environment ID to query

parameters.name: hostName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the host name to look for

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: Which page and how many results per page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: Which ordering to use when listing results

description:
Retrieves information about Environments: which DeployedApplications and which Hosts are there in an environment?

 A User must have READ permission on the environment to obtain the requested info.

name: com.xebialabs.deployit.core.api.HostService

methods.name: findDeployedApplications
methods.description: Find deployedApplications that have deployeds on the specified host.

parameters.name: hostId
parameters.comment: the host ID

parameters.name: deployedAppName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (Part of) the deployedApplication's to look for

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: How many results to display per page, and which page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: How to order the search results.

methods.returnDescription:
A list of {@see com.xebialabs.deployit.engine.api.dto.ConfigurationItemId} objects corresponding to the
 deployedApplications

methods.name: getEnvironmentsByHost
methods.description:
Gets all environments that the specified host is part of, including when and by whom this environment was last deployed to.
 Lists only environments that the user has READ permission for.

parameters.name: hostId
parameters.comment: The host ID to query for

parameters.name: environmentName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the name of the environment(s) to look for

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: How many results to display per page, and which page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: How to order the search results.

methods.name: countEnvironmentsByHost
methods.description:
Count the number of environments that the user has READ access to and the specified host is part of, optionally filtered by
 (part of) the environment name

parameters.name: hostId
parameters.comment: The host ID to query

parameters.name: environmentName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the environment name(s) to look for.

methods.returnDescription: The number of environments that this host is part of

description:
Retrieves information about Hosts: which DeployedApplications have deployeds on this host, and which environments does this
 host take part in?

 The user must have READ access to the specified host.

methods.name: definedPlaceholders
methods.description:
Find all defined placeholders, optionally filtered by (exact) key, (part of) the application ID and (part of) the
 application name.

parameters.name: key
parameters.comment: (Optional) the exact key to look for

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the application ID to filter on

parameters.name: applicationName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the application name to filter on

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: Which page and how many results per page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: Which ordering to use when listing results

methods.name: definedPlaceholdersByDictionary
methods.description:
Find placeholders, optionally filtered by (exact) key, or (part of) the value, dictionary ID and/or dictionary name
 Returns whether it is encrypted; if it isn't and the user has read access, provides its value; and tells which dictionary
 defines its value

parameters.name: key
parameters.comment: (Optional) The exact placeholder key to look for

parameters.name: value
parameters.comment: (Optional) (Part of) the placeholder value to look for

parameters.name: dictionaryId
parameters.comment: (Optional) (Part of) the dictionary ID to look for

parameters.name: dictionaryName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (Part of) the dictionary name to look for

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: Which page and how many results per page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: Which ordering to use when listing results

methods.name: definedPlaceholdersByEnvironment
methods.description: Find placeholders, optionally filtered by (exact) key, or (part of) the environment name or ID

parameters.name: key
parameters.comment: (Optional) The exact placeholder key to look for

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.comment: (Optional) (Part of) the dictionary ID to look for

parameters.name: environmentName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (Part of) the dictionary name to look for

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: Which page and how many results per page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: Which ordering to use when listing results

methods.name: definedPlaceholdersNames
methods.description: Find placeholders by (part of their) key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.comment: the key name pattern to match against

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: Which page and how many results per page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: Which ordering to use when listing results

methods.returnDescription: a list of placeholder key names

methods.name: findPlaceholdersForEnvironment
methods.description:
Gets resolved placeholder values, as far as the user has read permissions on them, on an environment, optionally filtered
 by (parts of) the key name, the placeholder value, and/or deployed application name, dictionary name, and/or host name that
 the value is restricted to.

 Returns information about the placeholder key, value (if readable), whether it is an encrypted entry, and restrictions

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.comment: The environment to query the resolved placeholder values against

parameters.name: key
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) placeholder key to look for

parameters.name: value
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the placeholder value to look for

parameters.name: deployedName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the deployed application name that the placeholder should be restricted to

parameters.name: dictionaryName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the dictionary name that defines the placeholder

parameters.name: hostName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the host name that the placeholder is restricted to

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: Which page and how many results per page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: Which ordering to use when listing results

methods.name: findPlaceholdersForHost
methods.description:
Gets resolved placeholder values for placeholders that have been restricted to a host, optionally filtered
 by (parts of) the key name, the placeholder value, and/or deployed application name, dictionary name, and/or host name that
 the value is restricted to.

 Returns information about the placeholder key, value (if readable), whether it is an encrypted entry, and restrictions

parameters.name: hostId
parameters.comment: the host ID to query resolved placeholders against

parameters.name: key
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) placeholder key to look for

parameters.name: value
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the placeholder value to look for

parameters.name: deployedName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the deployed application name that the placeholder should be restricted to

parameters.name: dictionaryName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the dictionary name that defines the placeholder

parameters.name: environmentName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the environment name that the placeholder is restricted to

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: Which page and how many results per page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: Which ordering to use when listing results

methods.name: findArchivedPlaceholdersForEnvironment
methods.description:
Gets historic resolved placeholder values on an environment, optionally restricted to finding those used in a specific deployment
 task, optionally filtered by (parts of) the key name, the placeholder value, and/or deployed application name, dictionary
 name, and/or host name that the value is restricted to.

 Returns information about the placeholder key, value (if readable), whether it is an encrypted entry, and restrictions

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.comment: The environment to query the resolved placeholder values against

parameters.name: key
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) placeholder key to look for

parameters.name: value
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the placeholder value to look for

parameters.name: deployedName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the deployed application name that the placeholder should be restricted to

parameters.name: dictionaryName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the dictionary name that defines the placeholder

parameters.name: hostName
parameters.comment: (Optional) (part of) the host name that the placeholder is restricted to

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.comment: (Optional) The task ID for which to find used placeholders

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: Which page and how many results per page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: Which ordering to use when listing results

methods.name: getControlTasks
methods.description: Find all active Control Tasks, optionally filtered by parameters.

parameters.name: begin
parameters.comment: filter by time interval beginning with date

parameters.name: end
parameters.comment: filter by time interval ending with date

parameters.name: states
parameters.comment: (Optional) filter task by task state

parameters.name: users
parameters.comment: (Optional) filter tasks belonging to users

parameters.name: taskName
parameters.comment: (Optional) filter by name of the task

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.comment: (Optional) filter task with exact taskId

parameters.name: fetchMode
parameters.comment: (Optional) toggle to fetch FULL task with blocks or just task SUMMARY

parameters.name: taskSet
parameters.comment: filter by taskSet - MY or ALL

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: (Optional) Which page and how many results per page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: (Optional) Which ordering to use when listing results

parameters.name: workerName
parameters.comment: (Optional) filter only specified workers

parameters.name: targets
parameters.comment: filter by selected target CI

methods.name: getDeploymentTasks
methods.description: Find all active Deployment Tasks, optionally filtered by parameters.

parameters.name: begin
parameters.comment: filter by time interval beginning with date

parameters.name: end
parameters.comment: filter by time interval ending with date

parameters.name: states
parameters.comment: (Optional) filter task by task state

parameters.name: users
parameters.comment: (Optional) filter tasks belonging to users

parameters.name: taskTypes
parameters.comment: (Optional) filter by task type - DEFAULT, INITIAL, ROLLBACK, UNDEPLOY, UPGRADE

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.comment: (Optional) filter task with exact taskId

parameters.name: fetchMode
parameters.comment: (Optional) toggle to fetch FULL task with blocks or just task SUMMARY

parameters.name: taskSet
parameters.comment: filter by taskSet - MY or ALL

parameters.name: onlySuccessful
parameters.comment: Deprecated use states instead

parameters.name: paging
parameters.comment: (Optional) Which page and how many results per page to retrieve

parameters.name: order
parameters.comment: (Optional) Which ordering to use when listing results

parameters.name: workerName
parameters.comment: (Optional) filter only specified workers

parameters.name: configurationItemIds
parameters.comment: filter by list of CIs - environment and application correlated to the Deployment task

name: com.xebialabs.deployit.core.api.dto.BannerInfo

methods.name: getKind
methods.description: Gets the banner kind

methods.name: setKind
methods.description: Sets the banner kind

parameters.name: kind
parameters.comment: - MAINTENANCE or INFORMATION

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Gets the message to be displayed in the banner

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the message to display in the banner

parameters.name: message
parameters.comment: - the message to display

description: Contains the banner contents and its kind (MAINTENANCE or INFORMATION)

name: com.xebialabs.deployit.core.api.dto.DefinedPlaceholderReference
description: A reference to a dictionary: its ID and its CI type.

name: com.xebialabs.deployit.core.api.dto.DefinedPlaceholderView
description:
Information about placeholders: its key, on which Configuration Item (ID and Type) it is defined, and whether the user is
 allowed to read its value

name: com.xebialabs.deployit.core.api.dto.DictionaryWithValueView
description:
Provides placeholder information: whether it is encrypted; if not, and the user has read access, then provides its value; and
 gives a reference to the dictionary that defines it.

name: com.xebialabs.deployit.core.api.dto.ResolvedPlaceholderView
description:
Contains information about resolved placeholders: its key, its value (if readable), whether the value is from an encrypted
 dictionary, which dictionary it is from, and to which containers, deployed application, and environment it is restricted
